Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
The GameBoard class represents the game board for a Battleship game. It includes methods for initializing the board, placing ships and grenades, checking for occupied positions, making moves, and determining the game's state.
Since:
2024-02-15
